flawed_nl_solution:
At the end of 2018, the tree will grow 100 x 1/10 = <<100*1/10=10>>10 meters more.
Thus, its height at the end of 2018 is 100 + 10 = <<100+10=110>>110 meters.
At the end of 2019, the tree will grow 110 x 1/10 = <<110*1/10=11>>11 meters more.
So, its height at the end of 2019 is 110 + 11 = <<110+11=121>>121 meters.
Therefore, the tree has grown 121 - 100 = <<121-100=12>>12 meters.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 21, not 12. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
